comments:
Stack trace:
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.emf.ecore.impl.DynamicEObjectImpl
	at org.eclipse.ocl.internal.evaluation.EvaluationVisitorImpl.visitOperationCallExp(EvaluationVisitorImpl.java:1012)

In such case OclInvalid should be propagated.

Committed a fix ensuring that attempts to use OclInvalid with collection operations results in OclInvalid, as in many cases a collection argument is required and, in others, colelctions aren't permitted to contain OclInvalid.

Also ensured that any other run-time exceptions that occur during evaluation are logged and result in OclInvalid.
